title.rendered: CHAIIWALA® LAUNCHES ITS NEW DRINKS IN ASDA

content.rendered:
Our new chaiiwala® drinks bottles have been launched into supermarket retailer ASDA. The original Karak Chaii and Chocolate Chaii are ready for on the go to enjoy the taste of the east anywhere in the UK.

After months of anticipation and a close relationship with ASDA, this has allowed us to supply our drinks to the public.

The support from our followers on social media has driven sales across the region, and we have seen a large number of bottles sold throughout.

We would like to thank everyone who has purchased a bottle and is helping support our brand into becoming a household name that is a go-to product.

We continue to work closely with a variety of retailers and hope to provide you our product in a range of different areas.
